footer.privacyPolicy: Yunda Surrogacy is an independent surrogacy agency and does not practice medicine or law. We support clients by facilitating connections and services, but all medical and legal decisions remain the responsibility of licensed professionals.
welcomingAChildIntoYourLifeStartsWithACo: Welcoming a child into your life starts with a conversation.
weDloveToLearnMoreAboutYouYourHopesYourQ: We'd love to learn more about you — your hopes, your questions, and the kind of support you're looking for. By completing this brief application, you'll help us understand how to best support your path to parenthood.
onceSubmittedOurTeamWillFollowUpWithAPer: Once submitted, our team will follow up with a personalized information package — no pressure, no commitment, just guidance made for you.
weProudlySupportIntendedParentsFromAroun: We proudly support intended parents from around the world.
firstNameOnlyFirstNameWillBeShownInPubli: First Name (Only first name will be shown in public profile)

byCheckingThisBoxYouAgreeToReceiveSMSMes: By checking this box, you agree to receive SMS messages related to the application process. Standard messaging rates may apply. You can unsubscribe at any time via SMS or update your preferences in your account.

yundaMainlyProvidesServicesInEnglish: Yunda’s primary service language is English, but we have consultants who speak Mandarin and interpreters available to support you throughout your journey — including communication with your surrogate.
eggDonationOnlyNoSurrogacyProvidedByPart: Egg Donation Only (No surrogacy, provided by partner agency Everie Egg Donation)

iAgreeToSubmitMyPersonalInformationAndAc: I agree to submit my personal information and accept to receive service updates and information from Yunda via email, SMS, phone, or mail. I acknowledge the privacy policy and understand that I can unsubscribe at any time.
yourInformationWillBeKeptStrictlyConfide: Your information will be kept strictly confidential and will not be sold or provided to any third party.
congratulationsText: We’re thrilled to let you know that based on your answers, you meet the basic requirements to BECOME A SURROGATE with Yunda Surrogacy. That’s a beautiful first step toward helping someone build their family — and we’re so honored to walk this journey with you.
nextStepsText: Next, please fill out a more detailed questionnaire covering your background, health history, and personal preferences during the surrogacy process. This will help us better understand you and ensure we match you with intended parents who are the best fit emotionally, philosophically, and in terms of cooperation.
thankYouMessage: Thank you for taking this step and giving others the most precious hope.

process.title: A Gentle Start to an Extraordinary Journey
process.intro1: Welcoming a baby through surrogacy is a path full of love and intention.
process.intro2: At Yunda Surrogacy, we're here not just as a service provider, but as caring partners beside you every step of the way.
process.intro3: Every family begins this journey differently. Some are just beginning to explore, while others have embryos ready.
process.intro4: No matter where you are, we'll walk with you—at your pace, with clarity and heart.
process.intro5: The full journey usually takes 12 to 16 months, and we'll make every step feel supported.
process.endTitle: A Journey with Confidence and Care
process.endDesc1: Surrogacy is not just a medical process — it's a path toward building the family you've been dreaming of. From your first consultation to holding your baby in your arms, Yunda Surrogacy is here to guide and support you every step of the way.
process.endDesc2: We understand that this journey can feel overwhelming at times. That's why intended parents choose Yunda — for our experience, transparency, and heartfelt commitment to making every detail feel clear, smooth, and supported.
process.steps.0.title: Getting Started
process.steps.1.title: Medical Preparation
process.steps.2.title: Finding the Right Match
process.steps.3.title: Securing the Foundation
process.steps.4.title: The Big Moment
process.steps.5.title: Welcoming Baby
process.detail.0.title: Step 1 : Getting Started
process.detail.0.steps.0: Fill out Intended Parent Matching Form
process.detail.0.desc: Once you begin with Yunda, you'll meet your dedicated case manager who will guide you through your personalized surrogacy plan. Whether you already have embryos or are just starting out, we'll help clarify your goals and timeline. You'll sign a service agreement to officially begin your journey with Yunda.
process.detail.1.title: Step 2 : Medical Preparation
process.detail.1.steps.0: IVF clinic coordination or connect with your chosen provider
process.detail.1.steps.1: Medical testing and U.S. travel planning
process.detail.1.desc: This stage focuses on preparing medically for the surrogacy process. Whether you're creating embryos or working with existing ones, Yunda helps with clinic coordination, medical documentation, and all logistical details—ensuring a smooth start to your cycle.
process.detail.2.title: Step 3 : Surrogate Matching & Screening
process.detail.2.steps.0: Receive surrogate profiles with background and health info
process.detail.2.steps.1: Intro video calls with candidates (if desired)
process.detail.2.steps.2: Lock in match and begin medical clearance
process.detail.2.desc: You'll be introduced to pre-screened, qualified surrogates based on your preferences. Once a match is confirmed, we'll proceed with detailed medical clearance and ensure the surrogate is fully approved to move forward.
process.detail.3.title: Step 4 : Legal & Trust Setup
process.detail.3.steps.1: Contract review and signing for both parties
process.detail.3.desc: We assist with setting up a third-party trust account to manage reimbursements and fees transparently. Your legal team will handle all necessary agreements to ensure your parental rights and expectations are protected.
process.detail.4.title: Step 5 : Transfer & Confirmation
process.detail.4.desc: The embryo transfer marks an exciting milestone. After confirmation through pregnancy tests and ultrasound, you'll be one step closer to parenthood.
process.detail.5.title: Step 6: Pregnancy Support & Delivery
process.detail.5.steps.0: Ongoing OB care and regular updates
process.detail.5.steps.1: Weekly check-ins from your Yunda case manager
process.detail.5.steps.4: Support with travel permits, passport, and return home
process.detail.5.desc: From the first trimester to delivery, Yunda provides comprehensive care and guidance. We support you and your surrogate throughout the pregnancy and ensure all legal and travel documents are ready for a smooth homecoming with your baby.

surrogacy.heroDesc1: From the moment you apply to BECOME A SURROGATE to the postpartum recovery after delivery, this journey is not only about helping others build their families—it's also a deeply meaningful experience of compassion, growth, and connection.
surrogacy.heroDesc2: At Yunda Surrogacy, we recognize the importance of your role and are committed to guiding and supporting you at every step. While every journey is unique, the average surrogacy process typically takes 16 to 18 months.

0.title: Submit Application
0.desc: Begin your journey by filling out our online application.
0.desc1: Surrogacy is not only about receiving compensation—it's about helping someone become a parent.
0.desc2: Our team will review your application and reach out for an initial conversation.

1.title: Psychological Evaluation
1.desc: A licensed therapist will assess your emotional readiness to BECOME A SURROGATE.
1.desc1: This ensures you are mentally and emotionally prepared for the journey ahead.
1.desc2: Your well-being is our top priority throughout the process.

2.title: Background Check
2.desc: For everyone's safety, we'll run a full background check.
2.desc1: This includes legal, child welfare, and in-home history to ensure a stable environment.
2.desc2: All information is kept strictly confidential.

3.title: Matching with Intended Parents
3.desc: Based on shared preferences and expectations, we'll match you with intended parents.
3.desc1: You'll meet them in a casual video call, supported by our case manager.
3.desc2: A strong match is the foundation of a successful journey.

4.title: Medical Screening
4.desc: You'll visit a fertility clinic for physical screening. All costs are covered.
4.desc1: If you have a partner, he may also undergo simple blood tests.
4.desc2: Medical clearance is required before moving forward.

5.title: Legal Agreements
5.desc: After medical clearance, both sides will work with independent attorneys to draft and sign the surrogacy contract.
5.desc1: Your rights and choices are fully respected.
5.desc2: Legal protection ensures a smooth and secure process.

6.title: Embryo Transfer & Pregnancy
6.desc: With contracts signed, you'll start medications for embryo transfer.
6.desc1: After transfer, you'll attend regular doctor visits and receive ongoing care and compensation.
6.desc2: Our team supports you every step of the way.

7.title: Birth & Beyond
7.desc: The birth is a special moment for everyone. After delivery, you'll return home with support and rest.
7.desc1: Many surrogates choose to stay in touch with the families they've helped.
7.desc2: Your journey leaves a lasting impact.

0.name: Emily, 32 years old, California
0.story: Becoming a surrogate was the most empowering thing I've ever done. Yunda supported me every step, and seeing the parents hold their baby for the first time—I'll never forget that moment.

1.name: Jessica, 29 years old, Texas
1.story: I had a great experience working with Yunda. The communication was honest and clear, and they truly cared about my well-being—not just physically, but emotionally too.

2.name: Carmen, 30 years old, Oregon
2.story: I was nervous at first, but Yunda answered all my questions patiently. The weekly updates, the check-ins, and their care made me feel like I was part of something truly meaningful.

3.name: Amber, 35 years old, Nevada
3.story: As a mom myself, I know how much love a child brings. Helping another family feel that love was something I'll cherish forever. Yunda made sure I felt respected and appreciated throughout.

surrogacy.ctaTitle: Think You Might Be a Good Fit?
surrogacy.ctaDesc: Let's start with a personalized consultation—no pressure, just answers.
